uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.events

Class MediaPlayerEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.events.MediaPlayerEventFactory

  • public class MediaPlayerEventFactory
extends Object
    A factory that creates a media player event instance for a native media player event or a semantic event.

    A "semantic" event is one that has no directly associated native event, but is instead a higher level event (like "sub-item finished", there is no such native event but it can be inferred and is a useful event).

      Create a media player event factory.

    • Method Detail

      • createEvent

        public MediaPlayerEvent createEvent(libvlc_event_t event,
                           int eventMask)
        Create a new media player event for a given native event.
        Parameters:
        event - native event
        eventMask - bit mask of enabled events (i.e. events to send notifications for)
        Returns:
        media player event, or null if the native event type is not enabled or otherwise could not be handled

      • createMediaNewEvent

      • createMediaSubItemPlayedEvent

        public MediaPlayerEvent createMediaSubItemPlayedEvent(int subItemIndex,
                                             int eventMask)
        Create a new semantic event for a played sub-item.
        Parameters:
        subItemIndex - index of the sub-item that was played
        eventMask - bit mask of enabled events (i.e. events to send notifications for)
        Returns:
        media player event, or null if the event type is not enabled

      • createMediaSubItemFinishedEvent
